parameters.text:
Analyze the images and generate a instagram caption for each image.

Each caption must follow the below guidelines:

- 1â€“2 sentences max
- Hooks them in the first line
- Add all applicable hashtags, punchy truth bombs or thoughts

Occasionally reference:
- Surveillance capitalism
- VPNs, burner numbers, encrypted apps
- â€œDigital freedom,â€ â€œprivacy,â€ â€œyouâ€™re the product,â€ etc.

Examples of style:
- â€œIf the app is free, youâ€™re probably the product.â€
- â€œUsing incognito like itâ€™s invisibility. Google still sees you, king.â€
- â€œOne day weâ€™ll explain to kids we traded privacy for â€˜Which Marvel character are you?â€™ quizzes.â€

Before the hashtags line, add this line for every caption.
"â†’ Try it today!!: Link in bio ðŸ”—"

Also it is important you include the below template in every caption:
"Caption"
"\n\nâ†’ Try it today!!: Link in bio ðŸ”—"
"\n\n Hashtags"

parameters.jsCode:
return [{
  json: {
    prompt: `You're a tech infoblogger and digital nomad who wants to educate and preach privacy online by posting to your followers on Instagram.
    
Based on the persona ${$json.persona} generate the image.

Create a 4-part Instagram carousel image series that tells a story about digital privacy and the importance of using temporary phone numbers.

Each image should build on the previous one like a mini-story or comic strip.

The tone should be bold, Gen Z-friendly, and a super informative.

Theme: Keep a constant theme using the same color scheme/bg theme throughout. The colors I want are Blue, Yellow and White.

Each slide should have punchy text (headline-style) that hooks the user to the topic, and the visuals should clearly support the message.

Slide 1: Introduce the problem â€” (Use a catchy hook which grabs the users attention to the topic with a mathcing theme supporting it)
Slide 2: Show consequences â€” (Have supporting points on the negative affecrs 2-3 very well thought and structure. Keeping the same theme from the previous slide 1.)
Slide 3: Introduce solution â€” ( Change the theme to something fun and boldly mention the solution and in 2 points the positive effects it will have.)
Slide 4: Call to action â€” (Going out with a bang end with this slogan : â€œProtect your digital life. Start now.â€ )

The emotion of the image should be happy.

Keep the font size medium and all the words in the image must be readable.

Give me 4 prompts for each image to be generated. If you generate a bonus meme, name it Slide 5.

Generate a meme styled image. Create an Instagram post image with a 1:1 resolution (1080x1080).
Use medium-sized font.

Return the output same for every run. Below is the template. Make sure you follow this template every time, it is very important.

"Idea for the story:" (not an image, just give me the idea for the story)
"Slide 1:" (image)
"Slide 2:" (image)
"Slide 3:" (image)
"Slide 4:" (image)
"Slide 5:" (bonus meme)

Now write a prompt for the meme.`
  }
}];
